alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 26 at 2:18PM MST until June 26 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 217 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 8 miles west of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to Bosque to 6 miles north of Freeman to 13 miles east of Big Horn to 13 miles west of Chui-Chu, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 107 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 31. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 9, and between mile markers 119 and 126. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Sonoran National Monument, Stanfield, Mobile and Ak- Chin Village. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
